column1: These settings affect all members in your community.
column2: These settings affect all members in your community.
These settings are applied on a per member level basis. Start by selecting the member level you want to modify, then adjust the settings for that level below.

column1: Do you want to let members view blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members view blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow viewing of all blogs, even private ones.
column2: Yes, allow viewing of all blogs, even private ones.

column1: No, do not allow blogs to be viewed.
column2: No, do not allow blogs to be viewed.

column1: Do you want to let members create blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view blogs, but only want certain levels to be able to create blogs.
column2: Do you want to let members create blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply. This is useful if you want members to be able to view blogs, but only want certain levels to be able to create blogs.

column1: No, do not allow blogs to be created.
column2: No, do not allow blogs to be created.

column1: Do you want to let members edit blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members edit blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit all blogs.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit all blogs.

column1: Yes, allow members to edit their own blogs.
column2: Yes, allow members to edit their own blogs.

column1: No, do not allow members to edit their blogs.
column2: No, do not allow members to edit their blogs.

column1: Do you want to let members delete blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.
column2: Do you want to let members delete blogs? If set to no, some other settings on this page may not apply.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete all blogs.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete all blogs.

column1: Yes, allow members to delete their own blogs.
column2: Yes, allow members to delete their own blogs.

column1: No, do not allow members to delete their blogs.
column2: No, do not allow members to delete their blogs.

column1: Do you want to let members of this level comment on blogs?
column2: Do you want to let members of this level comment on blogs?

column1: Yes, allow members to comment on all blogs, including private ones.
column2: Yes, allow members to comment on all blogs, including private ones.

column1: Yes, allow members to comment on blogs.
column2: Yes, allow members to comment on blogs.

column1: No, do not allow members to comment on blogs.
column2: No, do not allow members to comment on blogs.

column1: Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their blog entries. These options appear on your members' "Add Entry" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view blogs.
column2: Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can see their blog entries. These options appear on your members' "Add Entry" and "Edit Entry" pages. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to view blogs.

column1: Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their entries. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on entries.
column2: Your members can choose from any of the options checked below when they decide who can post comments on their entries. If you do not check any options, everyone will be allowed to post comments on entries.

column1: If you enable this feature, your members will be able to customize the colors and fonts of their blogs by altering their CSS styles.
column2: If you enable this feature, your members will be able to customize the colors and fonts of their blogs by altering their CSS styles.

column1: If you want to allow specific HTML tags, you can enter them below (separated by commas). Example: b, img, a, embed, font
column2: If you want to allow specific HTML tags, you can enter them below (separated by commas). Example: b, img, a, embed, font

This page lists all of the blog entries your users have posted. You can use this page to monitor these blogs and delete offensive material if necessary. Entering criteria into the filter fields will help you find specific blog entries. Leaving the filter fields blank will show all the blog entries on your social network.
